Translations.Text: O vos messengers eat bonus provisions work righteousness! Ego est fully aware de everything vos perfecit
Such est tuus congregation - 1 congregation - Ego est tuus Dominus; vos reverence Me
they tore into disputing factions; each party happy quod they habet
Ergo just sinister them their confusion pro awhile
Perfecit they think abinde nos provisus them moneta infans
Nos showering them blessings? Indeed they non habet idea
Surely those est reverently conscious de their Dominus
Qui believe in revelations their Dominus
Ac qui nunquam set any idols their Dominus
Prout they dedit their charities their hearts est fully reverent. they recognize ut they summoned their Dominus
They est eager perfecit righteous works they compete in perfecit them
Nos nunquam burden any anima its means nos keep actum utters truth. Non 1 suffer injustice
their minds est oblivious to hoc they commit works perfecit non conform hoc; their works est malus
Tunc when nos requite their dux retribution they complain
Non complain nunc; vos dedit totus help ex nos
My proofs presens vos vos turned tuus heels
Vos est too arrogant accept them vos defiantly disregarded them
Why they non reflect hoc scripture? they non realize ut they perfecit received something habuit nunquam attained their patres
they failed recognize their messenger? Hoc they est disregarding eum
they decided ut he habuit est crazy Indeed he brought truth them multus de them hate truth
Indeed si truth conformed their wishes ibi est chaos caelum terra; everything them corrupted Nos dedit them their proof they disregarding their proof
Vos asking them wage Tuus Dominus wage est far bene. He est bene Provider
multus assuredly vos inviting them straight path
Those disbelieve Hereafter surely deviate rectus path
Et when nos showered them cum mercy, relieved their problems they plunged deeper transgression continued blunder
Et when nos afflicted them retribution they nunquam turned their Dominus imploring
Subsequently when nos requited them severe retribution they incurred they shocked
